1.name: Iron Branch
1.description: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

2.name: Quelling Blade
2.description: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
2.Passive: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 13 for melee heroes, and 6 for ranged.

3.name: Band of Elvenskin
3.description: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

4.name: Belt of Strength
4.description: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

5.name: Robe of the Magi
5.description: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

6.name: Blade of Alacrity
6.description: A long blade imbued with time magic.

7.name: Ogre Axe
7.description: You grow stronger just by holding it.

8.name: Staff of Wizardry
8.description: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

9.name: Crown
9.description: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.

10.name: Aghanim's Shard
10.description: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

11.name: Ring of Protection
11.description: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

12.name: Blades of Attack
12.description: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

13.name: Chainmail
13.description: A medium weave of metal chains.

14.name: Helm of Iron Will
14.description: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

15.name: Blight Stone
15.description: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.
15.Passive: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 2 for 8 seconds.

17.name: Broadsword
17.description: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

18.name: Javelin
18.description: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
18.Passive: Grants each attack a 30% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

19.name: Claymore
19.description: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

20.name: Mithril Hammer
20.description: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

21.name: Phase Boots
21.description: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
21.Active: Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.

22.name: Arcane Boots
22.description: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
22.Active: Restores 160 mana to all nearby allies.

23.name: Tranquil Boots
23.description: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
23.Passive: Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 45 for 13 seconds.

24.name: Mekansm
24.description: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
24.Active: Heals 275 health to allied units in a 1200 radius.
24.Passive: Grants 2 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.
